greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of primitive inequivalent (up to Pi/3 rotation) non-hexagonal sublattices of hexagonal (triangular) lattice of index n.
link: John S. Rutherford, Sublattice enumeration. IV. Equivalence classes of plane sublattices by parent Patterson symmetry and colour lattice group type, Acta Cryst. (2009). A65, 156-163. [See Table 4.]
xref: Cf. A000086 (primitive hexagonal sublattices), A002324 (all hexagonal sublattices), A145394 (all sublattices), A001615, A304182.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 25 2009
ext: New name and more terms from _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, May 09 2018
